headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: https://example.com https://pbs.twimg.com; frame-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.ic0.app; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.youtube.com https://s.ytimg.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.youtube.com; object-src 'none'; worker-src 'self' blob:; font-src 'self' data:;
